text: Marino Giovanni Zorzi or Marino Giovanni Giorgi (died 1678) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Brescia (1644–1678). (in Latin) ==Biography== Marino Giovanni Zorzi was born in June 1634 in Venice, Italy and ordained a priest in Dec 1658. On 9 Jun 1664, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Alexander VII as Bishop of Brescia. He served as Bishop of Brescia until his death on 24 Oct 1678 in Brescia, Italy. == See also == *Catholic Church in Italy == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Alexander VII Category:1634 births Category:1678 deaths
title: Marino Giovanni Zorzi
